page.title: 14INDUSTRY
page.content: Omaglass are a prosperous company who, as the name suggests, supply glass for our windows in houses, shops etc. in the Omagh district and throughout Northern Ireland. Irish Bonding have a warehouse on the estate where they store bottled beer for distribution throughout public houses in Tyrone and Fermanagh. V and A wholesalers have a store on the estate and supply shops in the Omagh area. Soles for shoes are produced by the Shuplas concern which is based on the estate. Strule fireplaces manufacture and sell fireplaces, mantlepieces and tiles. Polystar Insulation is a factory which provides insulation for houses and finally we have M.H.M. (International) Ltd. which produces forklifts and trucks.
